text:
Rosalind Patricia-Anne Howells, Baroness Howells of St Davids, OBE (born 10 January 1931), is a Labour member of the House of Lords.
Howells was awarded an OBE in the 1994 New Year's Honours, she was made a Life peer as Baroness Howells of St Davids, of Charlton in the London Borough of Greenwich on 21 July 1999.
The name St Davids refers to the parish in Grenada where she was brought up, to the south-east of the Island.
In March 2009 she was inaugurated as the Chancellor of the University of Bedfordshire in Luton.
